StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOssProspectP.]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectID uniqueiden..er = null, @ID uniqueiden..er = null
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @ProspectID IS NOT NULL BEGIN DECLARE @RecCount int DECLARE @Height decimal(4,2) DECLARE @Weight int DECLARE @UpdateDate date.me DECLARE @LastUpdateUserId uniqueiden..er
SELECT @RecCount = Count(*) FROM USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst WHERE ProspectID = @ProspectID
SELECT @Height = Height, @Weight = Weight, @UpdateDate = LastUpdateDate, @LastUpdateUserId = LastUpdateUserId FROM [USMC].[O.cerProspectPac] WHERE ProspectID = @ProspectID
--- for exis.ng OSS prospect pac record, --- create a new one base on the height and weight entered IF @RecCount = 0 AND ( (@Height IS NOT NULL AND @Height > 0) OR (@Weight IS NOT NULL AND @Weight > 0)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [USMC].[ProspectPhysicalIst] ([ID] ,[ProspectID] ,[TestDate] ,[Height] ,[Weight] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[LastUpdateBy] ) VALUES (NEWID() ,@ProspectID ,@UpdateDate ,@Height ,@Weight ,@UpdateDate ,@LastUpdateUserId )
UPDATE [USMC].[O.cerProspectPac] SET Height = NULL ,Weight = NULL WHERE ProspectID = @ProspectID END
SELECT p.ID ,ProspectID ,TestDate ,Height ,Weight ,BodyFatPercent ,RunTimeMinute ,RunTimeSecond ,PuHang ,Crunch ,Score ,AmmoCanLi. ,PlankMinute ,PlankSecond ,Pullup ,Pushup ,ScoreRankID ,Classi.ca.on as ScoreRankDesc FROM USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst p LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[P.ScoreRank] r ON p.ScoreRankID = r.ID WHERE ProspectID = @ProspectID ORDER BY TestDate Desc END ELSE IF @ID IS NOT NULL BEGIN SELECT p.ID ,ProspectID ,TestDate ,Height ,Weight ,BodyFatPercent ,RunTimeMinute ,RunTimeSecond ,PuHang ,Crunch ,Score ,AmmoCanLi. ,PlankMinute ,PlankSecond ,Pullup ,Pushup ,ScoreRankID ,Classi.ca.on as ScoreRankDesc FROM USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst p LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[P.ScoreRank] r ON p.ScoreRankID = r.ID WHERE p.ID = @ID
END END
